name: Age of Pirates
description:
Made in 2 Days for Kenney Jam 2022 so it still has some bugs

Age of Pirates is a 2D Top-Down Shooter game where you destroy as many other pirates as you can and use your gold to buy more ships and grow your fleet.

Controls:

RMB (Right Click) to move

Credits:

Art:

  • "Pirate Pack" by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/assets/pirate-pack)
  • "Pixel Platformer" by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer)

Music:

Sound Effects:

  • SFXr

Font:

  • "Kenney Fonts" by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts)

Note:

How to change sound effect volume

Settings > Move the New Text slider (This should've been a  Sound Effect text, i'm pretty sure i've changed it before build the game)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The idea of this game is should be grow your fleet or has many ships as possible and do formation like in these image. But I have a limited time so the ships just overlap each other :(
